content: the summer days tunic is a lightweight top that is perfect for summer adventures the top is crocheted in row but still has a beautiful round neckline the pattern is beginner-friendly go check out more photos and all the details on the blog join my newsletter 1 to get access to the pattern library it s where all my patterns are free pdfs 1 https //view flodesk com/pages/5dc5be5e6a0d9f0026310508
